ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(4) > footer:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(4) > footer:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(4) > footer:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div:nth-child(4) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
